entry.name: tabularkv
entry.caption: Tabular environments with key-value interface.
entry.description:
The tabularkv package creates an environment tabularkv, whose arguments are specified in key-value form. The arguments chosen determine which other type of tabular is to be used (whether standard LaTeX ones, or environments from the tabularx or the tabularx package).
The package is part of the oberdiek bundle.
